Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Wandering aimlessly down the shopping street with Lee, you catch him eyeing a stall on the side.'}
{3: "Apparently, they're running some kind of challenge, with a nervous crowd huddled around watching contestants frantically assemble mechanical models."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: "Three... two... one... Time's up! Challenge failed!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Customer A', 3: 'Hold up, I was this close... Darn it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Well, two seconds too slow. Want another shot?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Customer B', 3: "Nah, I'm tapped on those commemorative coins... Way too hard, not enough time. I'm out of here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This should be a breeze for you, Lee, right?', 3: '18'}
{1: '1', 3: "The vendor, sensing a potential customer, practically beams and shoves a brochure explaining the whole challenge thing in Lee's face."}
{2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Basically, one person picks the parts from this giant pile, while the other builds the model within a time limit. No talking allowed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No talking allowed?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Vendor', 3: "It's Valentine's Day, so most folks are couples testing their teamwork... Up for the challenge, you two?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Win this challenge, and you snag a mysterious prize and a whole set of Akdilek mechanical parts!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Look at Lee)', 3: '29', 4: "Alright, we're in!", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Got it. Since we're in this, let's win.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Alright. Let me take your coins. Follow me...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Walking into the stall with the vendor, you whisper a "battle plan" to Lee.'}
{2: "I'll grab the parts, and Lee builds.", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Vendor', 3: "Hold on, there's one more rule. Gotta keep things fair, you know? Gotta draw straws for who does what.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Minutes later, you are at a table overflowing with parts. A mountain of parts sits in front of Lee, while you are left with tools for assembly.'}
{2: "I never thought I'd be the one building parts...", 3: '42', 4: 'Today is definitely not my lucky day.', 5: '42'}
{3: 'Lee gives you a reassuring glance, placing a spring in your hand.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Same basic idea.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: "Right, talk time's over, let's do this... Start now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "While you puzzle over the blueprint, Lee's already found the first piece and tossed it your way."}
{3: 'Lee watches you intently, like back in the Gray Raven armory when he explained weapon structures.'}
{3: 'The parts he picks, along with his silent encouragement, click with the assembly theory you already know, forming a clearer picture in your head.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{3: "It's like those afternoons back on the bench, assembling weapons, you putting the model together under his watchful eye."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'A perfect match, and five minutes to spare? New record...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Piece of cake!', 3: '65', 4: 'This whole thing was a joke!', 5: '69'}
{3: 'Finishing way faster than expected, a smug grin spreads across my face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If those parts weren't messed with, down to the millimeter, we'd have been even quicker.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Looks like we got ourselves some experts here... Fair enough, the prize is yours. And for that record time, consider this model a bonus!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crowd murmurs in shock as the vendor sighs and hands over a pile of rewards.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{3: 'Leaving the bustling street with your loot, you find a quiet spot high above Constellia. The open sky stretches before you, a canvas of stars sparkling overhead.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Didn\'t expect the "mystery prize" to be badges.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee opens the box, revealing a pair of magpie badges, their wings forming a perfect bridge.'}
{2: 'A little "magpie bridge" of our own.', 3: '85'}
{2: 'The Weaver Girl and the Cowherd needed, what, 33 trillion magpies?', 3: '86'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If it's someone you truly want to see, even the smallest chance is worth fighting for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I mean the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl.', 3: '93'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I just have a feeling you'd say something like that.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory228.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Looking at the "extra prize," you can\'t help but remember that Valentine\'s Day on the Nighter, the Nighter model he gave you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'It feels like a lifetime ago. Same festival, same moonlight, the familiar face who, after everything, is still by your side.'}
{2: 'Just thinking...', 3: '107'}
{2: "It's nice to be spending Valentine's Day together, like this.", 3: '108'}
{3: 'A warm hand closes around yours.'}
{3: 'Lee looks away awkwardly, eyes fixed on the two stars separated by the vast expanse of sky.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Really... it's nice.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under the soft moonlight, he murmurs repeatedly.'}
